result.title: International Paper: 2025-2027 Reset Creates A Re-Entry Window
result.text: International Paper continues its transformation, using cost-saving initiatives, mill optimization, and the divestment of Global Cellulose Fibers to drive margin and EBITDA growth. Q3 results showed adjusted EPS of ~$0.52, missing consensus, but North American Packaging Solutions EBITDA outperformed expectations. IP reduced its 2025 EBITDA guidance to $3.0 billion and 2027 target to $5.0 billion, surprising the market with the early long-term guidance cut.

result.title: ProAmpac Acquires International Paper's Bag Converting Operations
result.text: CINCINNATI--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ProAmpac, a global leader in flexible packaging and material science, has acquired the bag converting operations of International Paper (IP), a global leader in sustainable packaging. The acquisition expands ProAmpac's converting capabilities, further advancing the company's Fiberization of Packaging strategy and enhancing its ability to deliver customized bag solutions for the grocery, convenience store, and quick-service restaurant markets.

result.title: International Paper CEO to Speak at Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference
result.text: MEMPHIS, Tenn. , Oct. 16, 2025 /PRNewswire/ --International Paper Chief Executive Officer Andy Silvernail will speak at the Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference on Tuesday, November 11, 2025.

result.title: International Paper: Transformation Gains Pace, Buy Confirmed
result.text: International Paper's Q2 results showed ongoing transformation and cost-saving initiatives already in place. IP's mill optimization and divestment of Global Cellulose Fibers support margin expansion and EBITDA growth. Despite short-term FCF pressure from restructuring, we remain optimistic on IP's long-term outlook.

result.title: International Paper Declares Quarterly Dividend
result.text: MEMPHIS, Tenn. , Oct.13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- International Paper (NYSE: IP; LSE: IPC) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.4625 per share for the period from October 1, 2025, to December 31, 2025, inclusive, on the common stock, par value $1.00, of the Company, payable on December 16, 2025, to holders of record at the close of business on November 14, 2025.

result.title: Story Foundation Announces Up To $7 Million Open Market Purchase of IP Strategy (Nasdaq: IPST) Common Stock
